university.title: Cambridge University
university.description: The University of Cambridge is a public collegiate research university in Cambridge, England. Founded in 1209.

university.title: Harvard University
university.description: Harvard University is a private Ivy League research university in Cambridge, Massachusetts. Founded in 1636.

university.title: University of California
university.description: The University of California is a public land-grant research university system in the U.S. state of California, 1868.

university.title: ETH Zurich
university.description: ETH Zurich is a public research university in ZÃ¼rich, Switzerland. Founded by the Swiss federal government in 1854.

university.title: Max Planck
university.description: Founded in 1911 as the Kaiser Wilhelm Society in honor of its former president, theoretical physicist Max Planck.

university.title: University of Edinburgh
university.description: The University of Edinburgh is a public research university based in Edinburgh, Scotland and officially opened in 1583.

university.title: John's Hopkins
university.description: Johns Hopkins University is a private research university in Baltimore, Maryland. Founded in 1876.

university.title: University of Illinois
university.description: The University of Illinois is a public land-grant research university in Champaign and Urbana, Illinois and was founded in 1867.

university.title: Humboldt University
university.description: The Humboldt University of Berlin is a public research university in the central borough of Mitte in Berlin, Germany - 1810.
